body.raw:
From: "Alice Example" To: "Bob Receiver" Subject: [TEST] Письмо / Test / Auf Deutsch Date: Sun, 26 Oct 2025 12:00:00 +0300 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="mix-boundary-1" --mix-boundary-1 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="alt-boundary-1" --alt-boundary-1 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hello Bob, This is a test message to check parsing, cleaning and language detection. It contains: - English text - Русский текст: Привет, как дела? - Deutsch: Hallo, wie geht's? > On Sun, 25 Oct 2025 at 12:00 PM Max wrote: > > This is quoted text that should be removed by the cleaner. A link: https://example.com/test Reply-to: alice@example.com -- Best regards, Alice Example Am 25. Okt. 2025 schrieb Max Muster : > Vorherige Nachricht --alt-boundary-1 Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello Bob,

This is a test message to check parsing, cleaning and language detection.

Русский кусок: Привет мир!

Deutsch: Hallo Welt!

On Sun, 25 Oct 2025 at 12:00 PM Max <max@example.com> wrote:

> This is quoted text that should be removed by the cleaner.

Visit https://example.com/test

Contact: alice@example.com

--
Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Alice Example

--alt-boundary-1-- --mix-boundary-1 Content-Type: text/plain; name="sample.txt" Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="sample.txt" Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64 c2FtcGxlIGF0dGFjaG1lbnQgY29udGVudC4KVGhpcyBpcyBhIHNhbXBsZSBmaWxlLg== --mix-boundary-1--

From: "Alice Example" To: "Bob Receiver" Subject: [TEST] Письмо / Test / Auf Deutsch Date: Sun, 26 Oct 2025 12:00:00 +0300 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="mix-boundary-1" --mix-boundary-1 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="alt-boundary-1" --alt-boundary-1 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hello Bob, This is a test message to check parsing, cleaning and language detection. Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Alice Example
